short_summary: Communications Support for the Forest in Mind Program
description: The [ d ] Forest in Mind Program of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking the services of the following: one (1) senior Communications Consultant and one (1) intermediate Communications Consultant. The objective is for a consultant to assist the FMP with tasks and deliverables outlined within the SOW.
full_summary:
**Communications Support for the Forest in Mind Program**

**Announcement ID:** cb-8083-13899331

**Publication Date:** 2023-08-11

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-08-28T14:00:00

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Category:** SRV

**Description of Requirement:**

Natural Resources Canada's (NRCan) Forest in Mind Program (FMP) is seeking the services of a communications consultant with senior and intermediate level expertise. The successful bidder will assist the FMP with tasks and deliverables outlined in the Statement of Work (SOW).

The key objectives of the engagement include:

* Support the FMP with its annual work plans and terms of reference
* Provide communications consultation services to help fulfill the FMP's strategic priorities
* Collaborate with the FMP team to deliver the required tasks and products

**Location of Work:**

The work will be conducted remotely at the contractor's location.

**Security Requirements:**

* Information level: Protected A and B
* Personnel security level: Reliability Status

**Estimated Level of Effort:**

* Senior Communications Consultant: 40 days
* Intermediate Communications Consultant: 60 days

**Duration of Contract:**

The proposed contract period is one year from the contract award date, with the option to extend for two additional one-year periods.

**Inquiries and Proposal Submissions:**

Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement should be submitted to Nidhi Nigam, Contracting Authority, at Nidhi.Nigam@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca. Proposals will be sent directly to qualified Supply Arrangement Holders.

**This Invitation to Bildders:**

This tender is open to qualified suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement under E60ZT-18TSPS. A list of invited suppliers is provided in the attached document. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Suppliers are advised that Buyandsell.gc.ca is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

Note: The TSPS method of supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Suppliers who wish to learn more about becoming a TSPS Qualified SA Holder should contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA.  Immigration status may be required
